providerMeta.name: Budget Direct
providerMeta.blurb: Budget Direct has helped over 3 million Aussies since its inception in 2000. Winning various awards including Money magazine’s Best Value Car Insurance award multiple times, it offers customers low cost, value focused insurance. Customers can access 24/7 claim service, restriction options & free access to its hail tracking and warning system.

productMeta.name: Gold Low Kilometres Comprehensive

discount.discountOffer: Includes 15% off your first year’s premium for a new Car Insurance policy purchased online.
discount.discountOfferTerms:
Online Discount Terms & Conditions

1. Discounts apply to the first year’s premium paid for a new Budget Direct Gold Comprehensive Car Insurance, Gold Comprehensive Car Insurance - Low Kilometres, Third Party Property Only or Third Party Property, Fire & Theft Insurance policy initiated online on or after 29 March 2017. Discounts do not apply to optional Roadside Assistance.

2. The new policy discount amount is 15% on Gold Comprehensive Car Insurance, Gold Comprehensive Car Insurance - Low Kilometres, Third Party Property Only and Third Party Property, Fire & Theft.

3. Discounts do not apply to any renewal offer of insurance.

4. Discounts only apply to the insurance portion of the premium. Discounts are applied before government charges, taxes, levies and fees, including instalment processing fees (as applicable). The full extent of discounts may, therefore, be impacted.

5. Budget Direct reserves the right to change the offer without notice.

additionalExcesses.description: Drivers between the age of 21 and 24.

productMeta.description: SAVE 15% ONLINE (see T&Cs). Winner of CANSTAR award for "Outstanding Value Car Insurance" 2007-2016.
productMeta.inclusions:
• 24 months or 40,000km (whichever comes first) new car replacement, see PDS for full details
  • No excess to pay when third party is identified and at fault
  • No Claim Discount preserved when third party is identified and at fault
  • Personal Effects cover in the event of a collision, theft or forced entry (up to $500)
  • Key & remote replacement cover for theft (up to $1,000)
  • Child seat or capsule cover in the event of a collision, theft or forced entry (up to $500)
  • Hire car that meets your needs following a no fault accident or theft
  • Damage to trailer and caravan if attached to your car (belonging to you) (up to $1,000)
  • Death Benefit (up to $5,000)
  • Emergency Transport & Accommodation cover ($200 per day, up to $1,000 in total)
productMeta.optionalExtras:
• Reduced Window Glass excess
  • Accident Hire Car Cover
  • Restricted Driver discounts
  • Variable Excess to reduce premium
  • Your choice of Agreed (Conditions apply) or Market value for your car
  • Choice of Repairer
productMeta.benefits:
• All authorised repairs guaranteed for as long as you own the car
  • No paper forms to fill in ever
  • Over the phone claims
  • Option to pay fortnightly, monthly or annually
productMeta.disclaimer:
The indicative quote includes any applicable online discount and is subject to meeting the insurer's underwriting criteria and may change due to factors such as:
- Driver's history or offences or claims
- Age or licence type of additional drivers
- Vehicle condition, accessories and modifications
- Residential status
productMeta.specialConditions:
• 5,000 km per year limit; odometer reading required within 21 days of purchase
  • Drivers must be at least 21 years old

providerMeta.name: Virgin Money
providerMeta.blurb: Virgin Money launched in 2003 as part of the global Virgin brand . They have won the Mozo experts choice award for exceptional value several times offering their customers competitively priced products. Customers can access: 24/7 claims, flexible cover options SMS hail alerts and a no fault, no excess policy.

productMeta.name: Virgin Comprehensive Car Insurance Price Saver

discount.discountOffer: Price includes a 15% discount on your first year’s premium when buying online.
discount.discountOfferTerms:
Important information

Limits, Terms, Conditions & Exclusions apply. See the Product Disclosure Statement for full details.

Price discount displayed available for 1st year’s premium on new policies only.

Online Discount

The discount applies to the first year’s premium paid for a new Virgin Car Insurance policy initiated online on or after 30 March 2017. The discount applies to Comprehensive, Third Party Property Only and Third Party Property, Fire and Theft Car policies. Base rate premiums subject to change. The discount does not apply to any renewal offer of insurance. Discount applies only to the insurance portion of the premium before any fees, charges or levies that may apply. This may impact the full extent of the discount.

Virgin Car Insurance and Home & Contents Insurance Promoted by Virgin Money (Australia) Pty Limited ABN 75 103 478 897 (Virgin Money) Authorised Representative No. 280884 of Virgin Money Financial Services Pty Ltd AFSL 286869. Auto & General Services Pty Ltd (ABN 61 003 617 909; AFSL 241411) ("AGS") arranges the insurance on behalf of the product Issuer, Auto & General Insurance Company Limited (ABN 42 111 586 353; AFSL 285571) ("AGIC"). AGS and AGIC together are referred to as "Auto & General".

This information is of a general nature only and does not take into account your personal financial situation, needs or objectives. As Virgin Money and Auto & General don`t know your financial needs they can`t advise if the products will suit you. Please consider the relevant Product Disclosure Statement, Target Market Determination and Financial Services Guide available at virginmoney.com.au before making a decision about the Product. Virgin Money and Auto & General reserve the right to change the offer without notice.

providerMeta.name: Everyday Insurance
providerMeta.blurb: Everyday Insurance (formerly Woolworths Insurance) launched its insurance product in 2011. Their car insurance has been recognised for exceptional value, quality service and low cost, winning multiple awards. Customers can make quick online claims, manage their insurance products through their self-service portal and get discounts on their groceries.

productMeta.name: Everyday Insurance Drive Less Pay Less

contact.callCentreHours: Mon – Fri (8am – 8pm EST) and Sat (9am-5pm EST)

discount.discountOffer: As an Everyday Insurance customer, get 10% off your grocery shop once a month.
discount.discountOfferTerms:
*The 10% off your in-store shop at Woolworths Supermarkets offer, applies to eligible purchases during the Offer Period for active Everyday Insurance policyholders and Woolworths Mobile Customers who have a registered Everyday Rewards card linked to their eligible active Insurance policy or Mobile account(s). Compulsory Third Party (CTP) Green Slip policyholders, Roadside Assist and Everyday Travel Insurance policyholders are excluded from this offer.
You can redeem this offer once per calendar month, regardless of the number of Everyday Insurance Policies, Woolworths Mobile Accounts or Woolworths Credit Cards you hold. This offer is limited to one Woolworths Supermarket transaction up to $500, with a maximum saving of $50 per Everyday Rewards card, per month.

Whilst our team will try to apply the offer quickly to your Insurance policy or Mobile account(s), there will be instances where it could take up to 45 days. It's just our way of making sure every eligible member is included in the offer. For full terms and conditions, visit https://insurance.everyday.com.au/help.html?id=313. In addition to the above terms and conditions, by participating in the Everyday Rewards program, you agree to the Everyday Rewards Terms and Conditions(https://www.woolworthsrewards.com.au/terms.html).

providerMeta.name: Oceania
providerMeta.blurb: Oceania is a start-up aiming to use technology to take the industry into a new era. Thinking digital first, customers can manage their insurance from application to claim completely online. Even customer service has been made digital with an online chat system 24/7 rather than a call centre to help with customer claims.

productMeta.name: Digital First Comprehensive

discount.discountOffer: Australia's digital-first insurer, backed by one of the best
discount.discountOfferTerms:
Chat Like Mates

Oceania Insurance was born in the 21st century, and it shows. Instead of the long delays listening to repetitive on-hold music or waiting in queues at the local branch, you'll have all your favourite chat options to rely on for help with your insurance. With Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, SMS, iMessage, email and website chat all available - Oceania Insurance is at your fingertips.

Backed by Auto & General

Auto & General Insurance Company Limited is an Australian insurance company. Whether it's been cars, homes, travel, pets or motorcycles, they've been insuring a wide variety of Aussies since the year 2000.

They are also regulated by APRA and are a member of the Insurance Council of Australia.

providerMeta.blurb: Ozicare, has been providing Australians with hassle free car insurance at a price which won’t break the bank since 2001. Customers can take advantage of its 24-hour one stop claim assessment centres, competitive standard features and fortnightly, monthly or annual payments, all with no paper forms to fill in.

productMeta.name: Standard Comprehensive

discount.discountOffer: Cares for you and your car, at competitive prices
discount.discountOfferTerms: Our Standard Comprehensive cover has a lot of great features and offers a broad spectrum of cover. Not only will it insure you against damage to your car, but it will meet the cost of repairing damage to other vehicles as well, when you are deemed to be at fault.

providerMeta.name: Huddle
providerMeta.blurb: Huddle, has earned multiple awards and high customer satisfaction ratings since their inception in 2016. With over 35k customers they pay out over 1 million in claims each month and are focused on sustainability committing 1% of their revenue to the planet. Customers have access to a 24hr Australian based claims hotline.

productMeta.name: Comprehensive Pay As You Drive

contact.callCentreHours: Mon-Thurs(8am-6pm EST), Fri(8am-5pm EST) and Sat(8am-4:30pm EST)

discount.discountOffer: Award winning 24/7 online claims. Australia-based support teams. Underwritten by Hollard.
discount.discountOfferTerms:
Huddle won a Good Design award in 2019 in the Digital Apps and Software category for its instant claims experience.
The 24/7 claims service is available on the Huddle website or via the Huddle app.

  • 24/7 emergency claims lodgement and assistance
productMeta.disclaimer:
The indicative quote includes any applicable online discount and is subject to meeting the insurer's underwriting criteria and may change due to factors such as:
  • Driver's history or offences or claims
  • Age or licence type of additional drivers
  • Vehicle condition, accessories and modifications

providerMeta.name: Huddle
providerMeta.blurb: Huddle, has earned multiple awards and high customer satisfaction ratings since their inception in 2016. With over 35k customers they pay out over 1 million in claims each month and are focused on sustainability committing 1% of their revenue to the planet. Customers have access to a 24hr Australian based claims hotline.

productMeta.name: Comprehensive

contact.callCentreHours: Mon-Thurs(8am-6pm EST), Fri(8am-5pm EST) and Sat(8am-4:30pm EST)

discount.discountOffer: Award winning 24/7 online claims. Australia-based support teams. Underwritten by Hollard.
discount.discountOfferTerms:
Huddle won a Good Design award in 2019 in the Digital Apps and Software category for its instant claims experience.
The 24/7 claims service is available on the Huddle website or via the Huddle app.

features.name: Hire car following an at-fault claim
Damage to the insured vehicle caused by an accident
Damage caused by storm, hail or flood
Hire car following a not at-fault claim

productMeta.inclusions:
• 24 month new for old car replacement if your car is a total loss
  • Child safety seats and prams replacement ($500)
  • Cover for towing costs
  • Damage to personal property in your car ($500)
  • Emergency travel and accommodation ($500)
  • Essential repairs to restore your car to a roadworthy and safe condition ($500)
  • Hire car after your car is stolen ($70 per day, up to 14 days)
  • Legal liability cover ($20 million)
  • Locks and keys replacement ($1,000)
  • Trailer and caravan cover while it's attached to your car ($1,000)
  • Transit cover while your car is being transported between places in Australia
productMeta.optionalExtras:
• Excess-free windscreen cover
  • Hire car
  • Kanga Cover for excess free animal collisions
  • Pay As You Drive Cover - pay only for the kilometres you drive (your agreed kilometres can be increased during your period of insurance)
  • Roadside Assistance, an optional service product
  • Sports gear cover whilst it's in or on your car
productMeta.benefits:
• 24/7 emergency helpline
  • Become part of Huddle's Member Council to help make changes to their products and services.
  • Most claims can be lodged 24/7 with the Huddle App and in some cases you'll get a decision within minutes.
productMeta.disclaimer: The quote is indicative and is subject to meeting the insurer's underwriting criteria and may change due to factors such as, but not limited to: Driver's history, offenses or claims, Age or licence type of the drivers, Vehicle condition, accessories and modifications

providerMeta.name: 1st For Women
providerMeta.blurb: 1st for Women, was founded in 2003 with products tailor-made exclusively for the needs of Australian women. They are focused on ensuring that individual risks are identified accurately and assessed correctly to provide customers the right price. Customers can access 24-Hour phone claims helpline, 21-day cooling-off period and a no claims discount.

providerMeta.name: Ozicare
providerMeta.blurb: Ozicare, has been providing Australians with hassle free car insurance at a price which won’t break the bank since 2001. Customers can take advantage of its 24-hour one stop claim assessment centres, competitive standard features and fortnightly, monthly or annual payments, all with no paper forms to fill in.

providerMeta.name: Retirease
providerMeta.blurb: Retirease recognises that older drivers are some of Australia’s most careful drivers and rewards this with discounts (such as restricted driver discounts) and variable excess options to provide affordable car insurance for retirees. They have no paper forms to fill in and Australian-based contact-centres ready to help with a claim.

providerMeta.name: Carpeesh
providerMeta.blurb: Carpeesh is a technology focused brand aiming to lower the cost of car insurance and make roads safer. Their innovative app allows customers to earn rewards for safe driving, update their policy details and report and claim at the time of the incident. Customers have access to Carpeesh’s preferred repairer network and a variety of payment options.

providerMeta.name: Budget Direct
providerMeta.blurb: Budget Direct has helped over 3 million Aussies since its inception in 2000. Winning various awards including Money magazine’s Best Value Car Insurance award multiple times, it offers customers low cost, value focused insurance. Customers can access 24/7 claim service, restriction options & free access to its hail tracking and warning system.
